tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT,
  goal VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_address (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zipcode VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_name VARCHAR(100),
  duration_minutes INT,
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    goal STRING
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    preference STRING,
    value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    activity STRING,
    duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    action STRING
)

CREATE TABLE user_goals (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    goal_type STRING,
    target FLOAT
)
